snippet: In Circleville, W.Va., square dancing organized as part of the statewide Mountain Dance Trail project offered residents the chance to reclaim a brand and a legacy.
abstract: Square dancing makes its return to the Pendleton County Fair in West Virginia after a two-year absence; in Circleville, square dancing organized as part of the statewide Mountain Dance Trail project offers residents the chance to reclaim a brand and a legacy.
lead_paragraph: In Circleville, W.Va., square dancing organized as part of the statewide Mountain Dance Trail project offered residents the chance to reclaim a brand and a legacy.

headline.seo: A West Virginia Town Rediscovers Square Dancing
headline.main: Rediscovering a Town’s Roots, Feet First
headline.print_headline: Rediscovering A Town’s Roots, Feet First
